actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the operation of certain visitor facilities associated with, but outside the boundaries of, Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado.
short_title: Fall River Visitor Center Act of 1993

summary.text: Fall River Visitor Center Act of 1993 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to expend donated or appropriated funds for the operation and maintenance of a visitor center to be constructed with private funds on property owned by H.W. Stewart, Inc., for visitors to, and administration of, Rocky Mountain National Park, Colorado.

titles.title: Fall River Visitor Center Act of 1993

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the operation of certain visitor facilities associated with, but outside the boundaries of, Rocky Mountain National Park in the State of Colorado.
